sections.body: During Combat The monk relies on her shuriken, using Shot on the Run to begin and end behind cover. If cornered, she uses Stunning Fist and then escapes to a safe distance.
sections.name: Tactics

sections.body: These short-statured monks do their best to stay out of close combat, backing up their companions with well-placed shuriken.

special_qualities: fast movement, high jump, ki pool (5 points, magic), maneuver training, purity of body, slow fall 30 ft.
name: Nimble Shuriken Thrower
skills: Acrobatics +14 (+24 when jumping), Climb +12, Knowledge (local) +4, Perception +11, Sense Motive +8, Stealth +13, Swim +6
